group_1.textCenter: I'm sorry for suddenly having the both of you@come out here like this...

group_1.textRight: Is there some kind of emergency?!

group_1.textLeft: It's gotta be a Witch, right?! Grrrr... @I gotta crush it right now...

group_1.textRight: Right, that's the only reason you'd have for@making us hurry over.
Fear not!
I, Asuka Tatsuki, will defeat this enemy with@a single blow!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, okay, listen, you two. Don't go jumping@ahead with your silly assumptions.

group_1.textRight: Silly assumptions? Then it isn't a Witch?

group_1.textLeft: No. Today we have a different problem.
Felicia, I heard you're now exclusively@contracted as a mercenary...
Are you even allowed to help hunt Witches@for other Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: Huh?
[chara:100501:lipSynch_0][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:motion_100][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]I guess!

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's fine then.
They were kind enough to hire you, so try not@to cause trouble for them, all right?

group_1.textRight: Yup, I've been good. No worries!
So, what exactly do you need us to do?

group_1.textLeft: I'll have her tell you that.

group_1.textRight: Her?

group_1.textLeft: Me! I-I'm Karin Misono!@

I have something [chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:motion_200][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_022.exp.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]I'd like the two of you to@help me with!

group_1.textRight: And what's that?
I see.
You're searching for someone to play the cow@in your Halloween show?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, and Miss Knight here said she had the@perfect person in mind.

group_1.textRight: Well, if you're lookin' for someone to be the@cow, you gotta pick me!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, you even have those amazing horns!@TOO perfect!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100500:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Heh, I just love cows.
Wait a moment!
I get why you'd think of Felicia. She has@a lot of qualities that fit the role...
But I can't see what your reasons are for@choosing me at all...

group_1.textLeft: Asuka... Well, you...

group_1.textRight: What? What about me is like a cow?

group_1.textLeft: Well um, you know... Your chest...

group_1.textRight: My...chest...
[chara:101300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
[chara:101300:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]A-absolutely disgraceful!
You should be ashamed of yourself! Basing an@important decision on something like that!

group_1.textLeft: Pfffthaha, sorry, sorry!
I thought it'd be better if I gave her a@choice of people for the part.

group_1.textRight: I don't want to stand onstage knowing that's@the reason I was picked!
Please choose anyone but me!
Yeah, yeah! I wanna do it! Over here!@I wanna be the cow!
[chara:100500:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Cows are so cool... And they're cute, too!

group_1.textLeft: (I don't get what's cool about them, but it'd@be a big help if she played the cow...)
So, uh...

group_1.textRight: Felicia Mitsuki, at your service!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yeah, it's nice to meet you!

group_1.textRight: What other parts do you need filled?

group_1.textLeft: I need a wolf, and a demon girl...

group_1.textRight: Oh, I got this one.
If it's a demon girl you need, there's one@at my place.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]R-really?!

group_1.textRight: Uh-huh!
Then let's finish this tomorrow, okay?
It's a little late for all of us to go and@bother the people at your house.

group_1.textLeft: That's fine.

group_1.textRight: See ya tomorrow, then!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!

group_1.textCenter: [chara:101300:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Was I literally just brought here to be@teased?
